text: @KamalaHarris This incompetence is at the very least shared. I live in NY & friends of mine have died from the coronavirus. After 911 it is totally unbelievable to me that Chuck Schumer & Andrew Cuomo did not prepare NYC for a biological event. The governor has showed leadership but even so🌞
